IncidentReport.title: IncidentReport
IncidentReport.description: Represents a report of an animal abuse incident.

mediaUrls.description: URLs of media files (images, videos) related to the incident.

reportDate.description: Date and time when the report was submitted.

reporterName.description: Name of the person reporting the incident.

reporterContact.description: Contact information of the person reporting the incident.

AnimalWelfareResource.title: AnimalWelfareResource
AnimalWelfareResource.description: Represents an animal welfare resource, such as a shelter or vet.

name.description: Name of the animal welfare resource.

description.description: Description of the services offered by the resource.

category.description: Category of the resource (e.g., shelter, vet).

EducationalArticle.title: EducationalArticle
EducationalArticle.description: Represents an educational article or resource.

content.description: Content of the article (HTML or Markdown).

publicationDate.description: Date when the article was published.

/incident_reports/{incidentReportId}.description: Stores incident reports. Includes denormalized reporter information (reporterName, reporterContact) for authorization independence.

/animal_welfare_resources/{animalWelfare.description: Stores information about animal welfare resources (shelters, vets, etc.).

/educational_articles/{educationalArticl.description: Stores educational articles related to animal welfare and responsible pet ownership.
